DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this intervention study is to examine the effect of n-3 LCPUFA on growth and body composition, intestinal health and microbiotic composition, immune function and risk markers for later diseases in 9-18 months old infants and toddlers.
DOC.brief_title: Essential Fatty Acids During Complementary Feeding
DOC.criteria: Singleton infants, 9 mo +/ 2 wk, born >= 37 wk of gestation Birth weight >=2500g, a 5min Apgar score >= 7, birth weight >= 5th percentile for gestational age Chronic diseases expected to influence growth and dietary intake Use of medicine expected to influence growth and dietary intake Fish oil supplementation
